snippet: Kanye West’s much-discussed “Yeezus” dropped to No. 3 as sales shrank, while Wale’s album “The Gifted” opened at No. 1.
abstract: Kanye West’s much-discussed “Yeezus” dropped to No. 3 as sales shrank, while Wale’s album “The Gifted” opened at No. 1.

headline.main: 'Yeezus' Falls Sharply as Wale's 'Gifted' Hits No. 1
headline.print_headline: Kanye West’s Album Takes a Tumble
